timeout.description: After inactivity for this amount of minutes, the room will automatically be disbanded.

respond_to_invalid.description: Whether or not to respond to a command with prefix that does not exist.

delete_command_message.description: Whether or not to delete the command message that the user sends.

size.description: Default room size upon room creation

voice_channel.description: Whether or not to create a voice channel upon room creation

category_name.description: The name of the category where all the rooms are grouped.
